is.merkor.core.database.daos
Interface PairDAO<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
LexicalRelationHibernateDAOreadOnly, SimilarityCooccRelationHibernateDAOreadOnly, SimilarityVerbObjRelationHibernateDAOreadOnly, WordPairHibernateDAOreadOnly
public interface PairDAO<T>

An DAO interface for classes that need to have access to tables by one or two ids and one or two lemmata, e.g. WordPair and LexicalRelation Since implementing types will be implementing e.g. Pair and Relation and using these types as return types, a Lower Type Bound is defined in the return types of this interface.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Anna B. Nikulasdottir
